snippet: Abortion clinics forced to close last week by stringent new regulations in the state have filed an emergency appeal to the Supreme Court, arguing that the rules are an unconstitutional infringement of rights.
abstract: Texas abortion clinics that were forced to close because they do not meet stringent new state regulations file emergency appeal to the Supreme Court, arguing that rules are an unconstitutional infringement of rights.
lead_paragraph: Abortion clinics forced to close last week by stringent new regulations in the state have filed an emergency appeal to the Supreme Court, arguing that the rules are an unconstitutional infringement of rights.

headline.main: Texas: Abortion Clinics’ Closing Is Appealed
headline.print_headline: Texas: Abortion Clinics’ Closing Is Appealed
